document.full_text: the tennessee valley authority said high winds and possible tornadoes on wednesday caused serious damage to its high-voltage transmission system, knocking out 11 power lines and causing power outages in four states.
document.title: tva says storms knock out power lines in 4 states
lines_and_colors: the tennessee valley authority said high winds and possible tornadoes on wednesday caused serious damage to its high-voltage transmission system, knocking out 11 power lines and causing power outages in four states.
